name: Clarence
text: Man I can't believe the commisoner Buck O'Driscoll is going to be at the disc golf match today

name: Wade
text: Wow that's actually really crazy. What's a big wig like him doing here at such a small town

name: Clarence
text: I don't know man. I heard he's a big fan of our football team.

name: Wade
text: You think the players strikes will end soon?

name: Clarence
text: Based on historical data from previous disc golf matches the odds are highly unlikely.

name: Clarence
text: BTW, my fantasty ball golf team is kicking your butt again
